metadata.title: Identification and characterization of the role of c-terminal Src kinase in dengue virus replication OPEN

abstract.original_text: SFK). Our results identify a new role for Csk in flavivirus replication, which further enhances our understanding of viral replication and provides a new drug target for antiviral development.

sentences.segment_text: Our results identify a new role for Csk in flavivirus replication ,
which further enhances our understanding of viral replication and provides a new drug target for antiviral development .
